articles.description: Crude oil demand is expected to improve in just a few short months, Saudi Aramco CEO Amir Nasser said this week at IHS Markit's CERAWeek, with oil demand from China, east Asia, and India creating most of the increase
articles.title: Aramco CEO Sees Crude Demand Picking Up Quickly - OilPrice.com
